name: Mod Translation
description:
This mod is used to translate text that other mod added.

translate covers:
mod regions
mod slugcats
custom pearls
custom dialogs
custom missons
custom dev comments

non-steam version here: https://github.com/InkCloudStarsDream/Rainworld-ModTranslation

Currently support Chinese, welcome to help us to translate into other languages.

If you want to help us to translate or put up some advice, feel free to DM me on Discord:@MoseYanyun

Contributors:
@MoseYanyun,@Exmeow,@Celen,@W1LD1CECA7,@Echo Wings
